name: Boxx boii goes brrrrrrrrrrrr!!!!
description:
Submission for BYOG 2021
Themes: Minimal Interaction and Reset.

Boxx boii goes bbrrrrrrrrr!!!! is a rhythm puzzle game in which the player controls the game solely using the space bar.

Video : Gameplay Video

How to play:

  • Press and hold SPACE to stop Boxx boii.
  • Release SPACE to move Boxx boii in the direction of the arrow.
  • Press and release before Boxx boii runs out of time.

Credits :
Andrew David, Jerrin Thomas, Suraj Kispotta
